forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. North wind 17 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 49. North northeast wind 15 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unveils a delicate panorama of clarity and light. A radiant sun oversees the city, casting a gentle warmth over the bustling streets, its high temperature nudging near sixty-two degrees. The vibrant skyline stands boldly against a backdrop of deep blue, unmarred by fog or haze, as the brisk north wind carries with it a hint of freshness, ensuring that any lingering chill is met with a spirited embrace.

As evening falls, the sky will maintain its clear disposition, descending to around forty-nine degrees—a fitting temperature for a stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a leisurely visit to the local cafes where the conversations flow as freely as the crisp air. Dressing in layers will be wise; a light jacket can combat the evening's coolness, allowing one to savor the vibrancy of the city without discomfort. This is a day to embrace the outdoors—exploring the neighborhoods or enjoying the serenity of the parks could be just what the spirit craves amidst the urban rhythm.
